description: Identifies missing elements, unanswered questions, or overlooked considerations in an idea, plan, or argument. This decorator helps improve completeness by systematically discovering and highlighting gaps that need addressing.

parameters.name: aspects
parameters.description: The specific types of gaps to focus on finding

parameters.name: depth
parameters.description: How thoroughly to analyze for gaps

parameters.name: solutions
parameters.description: Whether to suggest solutions or approaches for addressing the identified gaps

examples.description: Basic comprehensive gap analysis of a business plan
examples.usage:
+++FindGaps
We plan to launch our SaaS product with these features and marketing channels...
examples.result: First identifies gaps across various aspects of the SaaS product launch plan, then suggests solutions for addressing each gap

examples.description: Exhaustive stakeholder-focused gap analysis without solutions
examples.usage:
+++FindGaps(aspects=stakeholders, depth=exhaustive, solutions=false)
Here's our urban redevelopment proposal...
examples.result: Provides an exhaustive analysis of overlooked or inadequately considered stakeholders in the urban redevelopment proposal, without suggesting solutions
